comment.text: No beer on tap at rooftop bar and limited menu. Bartender was super nice and the rooftop was very nice.

Surprise birthday dinner RUINED. Extremely disappointed in this "fine establishment." I chose to host my husband's surprise birthday dinner on Rowdy Tiger's rooftop with 15 of our closest friends. This was my first choice because my husband and I had previously enjoyed a date night here months and truly enjoyed the drinks, food and overall service. I made the reservation 6 days in advance & I emailed back & forth with Nick, Director of Food & Beverage, up to 2 days before the event. I confirmed the reservation for 15 at 7:30 pm on the rooftop for full service (full menu dinner + drinks), which they usually do not allow, but stated they would make an exception. Unfortunately, we never even made it to round 2 of just the drinks! A few of my guests arrived at 6:45 pm to enjoy drinks at the bar, but was told that they could go ahead & sit at our reserved rooftop section since it was already available, which is where they ordered drinks. The lasts of the guests arrived by 7:45 pm and by that time all guests had ordered their 1st round of drinks. My husband & I arrived to the surprise dinner at 8:15 pm & none of my guests (18 total) had even received their FIRST drink, which most were ordered at 6:45 pm. The bartender was asked multiple times about the drinks prior to my arrival & they received the same response each time, "they're coming up". We mingled for about 20 mins after my husband & I arrived  someone finally came to our party to RETAKE our drink order. Shortly after, most of us received our drinks. Some watered down, others not made correctly, but we decided to try to just ignore the issues & push on to have a good time despite the excessive waiting. Almost 45 minutes had past & not one bartender or server came to check in, take our dinner order, acknowledge us, NOTHING. At this point, we were done. The vibe had been completely ruined. We asked for a manager who came out & told me that he was just informed about our reservation that day, which I felt was not my issue since I had done everything on my end for the reservation. Many of us in the party work in the restaurant industry so we were very understanding, at first. The restaurant was still almost completely empty & we were a very calm, PATIENT party so I am not sure what the issue could have been. I told the manager that we had every intention on spending our great night at Rowdy Tiger with multiple drinks, appetizers, and dinner. An 18 person check with everything that we planned to order would have been great money for the establishment AND server because we would have tipped generously on a high tab, but we never got further than ordering drink 1. I told the manager we'd like the check ASAP so we could quickly move on to have dinner somewhere else. He offered us a discount on the single drinks each of us ordered. 45 minutes passed and we NEVER RECEIVED THE CHECKS. I'm not sure what happened to the manager, but he completely disregarded the request for our checks. We went to the bar, paid for our ONE drink and left. A birthday night, with a group of friends who hardly ever see one another, that had SO much potential to be an amazing gathering was completely ruined and sadly, no of us will be returning.
Excellent breakfast! The potatoes are cooked perfectly with that right amount of crunch and soft inside. The eggs, toast, and chicken sausage were flavorful. Excellent service!!!
The brunch vibes are relaxing. Cheerful staff to greet you as you walk in. Our server Johnny was extremely attentive and helpful with making menu selections. Food was phenomenal!

photos.caption: Deviled eggs topped with short ribs

comment.text: Came here to celebrate Galentine's Day with the ladies. Our waiter was Tony and he provided superb service! Loved the ambiance, drinks and food!

owner_replies.comment: Thanks for the great review, Quandra! We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your Galentine's Day with us. We look forward to you coming in again!

comment.text:
Friendly staff and good drinks, sloooow food service on Christmas Day.   Perhaps it's because of the holiday but..... eat snacks before you go if this is normal.  Once the food finally arrives, it's ok but not particularly memorable. Duck is tender and juicy, but put something else on the fork, like the butternut squash pur√©e, and that other thing is the only flavor that comes through.  Bland but well cooked is how I would describe the meal, including dessert. 

If you want Just drinks and appetizers-- book an igloo, cozy warmth with your friends can be a good time.
Terrible service, long waits, the appetizers came out with the entrees, food came out cold. Drink orders were incorrect. Terrible experience I won't be back.
This place was awesome! Food was delish and service was awesome. Definitely try the pork chop.

owner_replies.comment: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review, Mike! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! We hope to see you again soon!

comment.text:
Rowdy Tiger is a very underrated spot. I've been here several times (dinner each time) and have had a really good experience.

PROS: 

-First of all, the chef of Rowdy Tiger is very creative with the menu and each meal I've had has been delicious. The burger is a constant on the menu, and it is really really good! I've also had the pork chop and the cioppino, and both were delicious. Can't stress enough that the food at Rowdy Tiger is DELICIOUS!

- Really cool atmosphere. They tend to have live music on certain nights. The rooftop is a great spot to hang out and have a drink... or play foosball or ping pong... with views of Atlanta around you.

CONS: 

- The place does have a great selection of whiskey and scotches, but a couple of times already I've selected a whiskey or bourbon that I liked, only to find out that they've run out. They have to find a better way to manage the whiskey list cause it keeps happening - if you're going to be a Whiskey Bar, have all the whiskey on your list available, right? 

- Lastly, it seems they are a bit understaffed (maybe because its relatively new), because a couple of times our server seemed to be the only one out on the floor, which could not have been easy on him. Though he still did a fantastic job.

photos.caption: Birthday dinner at the best whiskey bar in ATL

owner_replies.comment:
We appreciate your loyalty and your constructive comments. 
Thank you for the recommendation and recognition.
Your comments will be shared with our team.
I am sure they will look forward to your return visits.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
Not impressed 

Service was slow n inattentive 

I would not return anytime soon 

Sorry

I don't even know where to start. We waited 15 min for a waitress to come to our table. The food was good when we finally got it. Our cocktail the Ophelia was delicious. However, they are short staffed and the service was horrible. We had to ask for refills on our water and were never asked if we wanted a refill on our coffee. One person in our party asked the server about dessert and the server didn't ask the rest of the table if we wanted anything.  After 30 min her dessert hadn't arrived so she asked for it to be boxed up to go. 

The positive is that our server offered free apps to make up for our wait time but that doesn't make up for the overall poor experience.

Overall the food was good! The wings were delicious! The chicken and waffle were outstanding! 

I really hope they hire more people so that the hostess doesn't have to serve mimosas.

Absolutely fantastic. Our waiter made several recommendations before we started choosing what we would get and I decided to try his recs which I did not regret at all! The food was wonderful, as was the service. Will definitely return.

I went to Rowdy Tiger this past weekend for my birthday for brunch and it was great. The bartender is an expert with the drinks because they were on point. I had a big group in my party and the staff was great. I really enjoyed it and will definitely be back again.

owner_replies.comment: Thank you Kia for your feedback! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your birthday celebration with us. We will pass along your feedback and positive comments to our management team. We hope to see you again soon!

comment.text: Service was great but the food was very average.  Granted I just ordered a basic blackened salmon and a side of broccolini...the salmon was over cooked and broccolini drowning in butter.  I guess if you were coming for the whiskey which I heard is pretty outstanding I'd give it a pass.

This bar/restaurant was great and perfect for us. We went once for the bar and it wasnt crazy busy for a top shelf liquor bar area. Our second trip was for dinner and again, very impressive. The waiter was funny and helpful, the food was tasty and served up fast. There was a band there that night that was fun and great tunes. Thanks staff!

owner_replies.comment:
We are delighted that you were impressed again. Thank you so much for your return visit, your commentary and the recognition of your server and the food quality.
We are high appreciative and look forward to next time you are in town.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: This was my first time coming & the food was really good. The pork chops were thick & amazing especially the greens. The fritters, mussels, & deviled eggs were great. The only issue was the wait & not having an assigned waitress when we first seated. Granted we did have a large party of about 10 so I understood waiting for the entire party but at least our drinks should have been an exception. I will try again during the day for their brunch to see the flow of things.
Great food and excellent service... the bartender, Johnny, was attentive and was on point ... will come back and recommend to friends and family when they come to town
They would not seat us. We had a reservation and everything and the employee continued to walk past us without acknowledging our presence. Very rude.

It was our first time but Amazing place, amazing workers, very laid back nice welcoming vibe, food was absolutely great we went there for lunch and I had a salmon sandwich and all I can say about that entree is TRY IT. Also very good drink. If you would like a warm vibe to your drink we had the "old fashion" and it has a hints of cinnamon . We will be coming back

Stopped in for a late night snack of pretty pickled deviled eggs (delish) and amazing 12 hour collard greens with the perfect glass of Kung Fu girl Riesling wine to balance it out.  My friend enjoyed a house specialty cocktail of Borbon Peach and Jalepeno.  All so yummy good.  My server was kind and attentive (Nicole) and I cannot wait to come back for dinner in December to try more delights.

owner_replies.comment:
We are delighted you enjoyed your late night visit. We appreciate that you stopped by and look forward to your planned dinner in December. See you soon......
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: NEW MENU! I eat here often. This new menu is the best ive had. Love the new burger and fish sandwich. Best fries they've had. But Johnny the server never disappoints!!!!! Make sure he serves you.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your loyalty and recent visit. We love the feedback.
Trust we will see you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Great bourbon selection and expertly made cocktails. My Basil Hayden Manhattan was lovingly stirred with just the right ratio of bourbon, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Although I didn't sample the food, the person next to me at the bar was raving about the quality (and it did look and smell amazing). He also said he got one of the best Old Fashions he's had in Atlanta. I'm definitely putting this place on my rotation. Can't wait to come back to try the food.

owner_replies.comment:
Love the review, comments and the feedback from your fellow guest. Thank you for stopping in. Maybe the next time try Whiskey Wednesday. We look forward serving you again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: I got in 10 minutes before closing, the full menu was still available.  The pork chop was on point and the service was fast.  Would recommend.

owner_replies.comment: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your pork chop and time with us. We will pass along your feedback and positive comments to our management team. We hope to see you again soon!

comment.text: This place was amazing . The service the excellent and the bartender Johnny did an amazing job at making sure I was comfortable . Breakfast tasted outstanding . I will be coming back soon .

While we had to wait for about 20 min even though the majority of our party was here (6-7) our server was amazing and beyond competent. Meme wore her mask appropriately thee entire time (cannot say that for any of her coworkers). Did not confuse anyone's orders, was patient and kind. I highly recommend Meme be your server! Oh and the Winston Grey cocktail was amazing!! Served in a super cute tea cup perfect for ig. X4

I went here for a quick brunch with a friend.  The venue was amazing.  I love the art work here.  My server was Johnny, he was one of the most polite people I've ever met.  He recommended the short rib poutine, 100% worth trying.  He was checked back often and made sure we were fine.  I'm definitely going back.

We were excited to try this restaurant/bar in the lobby of our hotel, but we were disappointed with our visit. 

Pros: We had reservations and got a nice corner booth and were promptly seated. Our server Mimi came pretty quickly and filled our water glasses. We had wings and tried the peach smash drinks - those were great and why they get 2 stars! My husband was celebrating his birthday, but this wasn't acknowledged though mentioned in the reservation. The positive things end here.

Cons: Our server took all of our menus since we decided not to order dinner, including the drink menus although we expressly stated we'd be ordering more drinks. She didn't return AT ALL until we got frustrated and ready for the check 30 min later. We definitely wanted to try more whiskey, but since we were ignored that was impossible. There was an old disposable coffee cup on a ledge next to us that sat there the whole time. That was weird for a place that was as nicely appointed as this one. 

We still tipped Mimi 20%, but honestly that's just because she did seem slightly overwhelmed with tables and not many servers. We will not return or recommend anyone else return - at least not for dinner/dessert.

owner_replies.comment:
Happy belated birthday to your husband. Thank you for staying at the Hotel and thank you for visiting Rowdy Tiger. We appreciate your business and your review and commentary as well. I am very sorry that you experienced some strong plusses and some disappointing minuses.
Your comments will be a teachable moment for our team, so we thank you for sharing.
I trust you will stay with us again in the future, when your travels bring you our way and hope that you will try Rowdy Tiger again as well.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
The bourbon glazed chicken wing appetizer was generous with HUGE wings and was DELICIOUS. My first burger was sent back for being overdone but the second one that came out was perfectly cooked and extremely fresh. A little pricey, but it's a hotel restaurant and a unique one at that, so a little bit of a premium is reasonable.

Apparently the bar has been struggling to keep many of their menu whiskeys in stock, and I ordered about 6 different scotches before finally finding one that I was interested in that was also available. Keep in mind, these are menu-listed offerings. Luckily there is so much to chose from that there's bound to be something for every whiskey palate.

A few bumps, but once this new restaurant works out it's kinks it's going to be AMAZING, especially if you are a fan of whiskey & fine spirits.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for stopping by and for your precise feedback. We have shared your comments with our team.
We look forward to future visits and additional enjoyable experiences.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
I have attended Rowdy Tiger three times now - 2 times with work and once for an engagement celebration. Each time, the restaurant has provided us attentive service. The manager (Okan), specifically, has been friendly, welcoming, and very responsive to any questions or concerns.

For two of my visits, I rented out their semi-private space. It was perfect for both my corporate luncheon and engagement celebration with friends. The staff is flexible and menu has a wide variety - making it great for groups. I also loved that they let you create a custom menu and even print it out for each seat at your event. Also highly recommend their ice creams - the bourbon flavor is delicious!

Parking is available both on the street and valet (they will comp your valet parking!)

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you so very much for your loyalty and your feedback.
We sincerely appreciate the recognition, especially of Okan, and your recommendation.
We are thrilled that you enjoyed all three of your recent events and we look forward to future ones.
Much appreciated. See you soon.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Cannot day enough about this hotel restaurant!  The service was terrific, the ambiance energised and the food surpassed all our expectations.  I wish we had more  time to come back and explore the menu further.  We will be back on our next trip!

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for the recommendation, your 5-stars and your recent visit.
We appreciate the consideration returning again during your next visit to Midtown Atlanta.
See you then.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: I live right next door and I've been to this spot multiple times . Somehow I forget each time that I really don't enjoy this spot. The service is cool. The ambiance is not bad. It's the food. Nothing is good. The fish sandwich is a mess. They give 2 filets like a double cheeseburger. Might sound tasty on paper but it doesn't work. The chicken and waffles are super lack luster. The shrimp and grits are sub par. The brunch is pointless. Btw who want to pay almost 30 bucks for eggs bacon and toast

owner_replies.comment:
Hello Javar, 

Thank you for taking the time to give your feedback about Rowdy Tiger. We are sorry that the times that you've been here have not met your expectations.  Let me start by saying that we truly value our neighborhood guest. We want it to be a place that you want to visit, and a place that feels like your go to spot.  We have made some exciting transitions in regards to a new Executive Chef that just started a week ago. So we have exciting new changes coming. We have already started making changes to the menus.  Feedback like yours is something that we take very seriously.  I would really like to invite you back to witness these changes sometime in the future if you'll give us the opportunity again.  Please feel free to reach us at info@rowdytigeratl.com to discuss further. Again I thank you for your feedback

comment.text: Went here for a birthday. Had 30 people and contacted the restaurant before to make sure they would be prepared. Took 5 days to finally get in contact with someone. They said that they'd add an extra bar tender to handle the traffic, but unfortunately this bartender seemed as though she had never served drinks before. Multiple drinks not made correctly, multiple drinks on the menu were not available. If you're gonna charge $16  for a cocktail I feel like the bartender should know how to make them on a busy Friday night

Nice restaurant with a unique Farmhouse style decor. The service is great too. The waitstaff is friendly remembers you/your orders if you come in more than once. While all of them are great, Tony is one of the best servers there he has a great sense of humor, handles large parties efficiently, offers a personal dining experience.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your visit and recognition. We are delighted that you and your guests enjoyed the experience and we look forward to future visits.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Why? Just why would you go here unless you are staying in this hotel? We asked this question when an acquaintance suggested we meet up here for a drink, and then showed up 45 minutes late. A lame hotel bar with $15 cocktails (good, but so overpriced, as you'd expect at a hotel bar) that has a live musician playing smooth jazz on a Saturday night? This is the place of my nightmares. If you are looking for a cold, sterile place to listen to cool jazz and spend too much on food and drinks, this is your spot!

owner_replies.comment:
We strongly feel that we are so much more than just a hotel bar, but we certainly appreciate your feedback, your visit and experience. Thank you for your commentary and we truly hope you will return to experience Rowdy Tiger one more time to give you maybe a different picture. I would ask you to have another look at our warm design, experience the great service and enjoy the creations of our talented Executive Chef Christina Wai.
We look forward to that opportunity.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Brunch with friends on Easter Sunday, 4/4/21. Food and service were both great. I will definitely return. Two thumbs up!

Came here for brunch Saturday morning with four other girls. We originally planned to have six and chose Rowdy Tiger in part because they took reservations. It turned out that we really didn't need them as we were one of maybe five tables. It was 11:00am on a Saturday and I expected it to be more crowded but it was raining so maybe people were staying in!
The restaurant itself is really beautiful; it's big and open and doesn't feel crowded at all! I liked the decor and vibe a lot, it feels upscale and trendy but still comfortable.
Overall we were all happy with our food. We shared a cinnamon roll and that was pretty good! I got the braised short rib benedict and my only complaint is that the egg was hard boiled not poached. One of my friends ordered the benedict as well and hers came out the same way. I'm not sure if this was on purpose but I was disappointed; the runny yolk is what makes a benedict in my opinion! The short rib was delicious and the potatoes were tasty so it was still a good meal.
We had fun and were happy with our meals but I probably won't come back; it wasn't anything to write home about and it's not really on my side of town. 
Pro: They do have valet parking but we were all able to find metered parking right in front of the restaurant.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your visit and your review. We are delighted that you had fun and that you were happy with your meals. We truly hope you will return in the future and we would love to welcome you back together with your friends for brunch.
Stay well and please continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
Tried the Rowdy Tiger for lunch today, since I work a block away and am always on the look out for a solid sit-down place in midtown. I was there with four co-workers, and ordered the spinach cobb. 

Service was really slow, especially considering the fact that the place had only a few occupied tables and a good half dozen servers running around. My $18 salad was less than meh, limp spinach, overdressed, no bacon and over cooked chicken. 

Won't be back.

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for stopping in today. We sincerely appreciate your visit and your constructive feedback.
Please accept my apologies for your less than satisfactory experience.
Since you are right around the corner, we would love for you to return and experience the real Rowdy Tiger.
Please feel free to reach out to me or our Food & Beverage Director Okan and we would gladly assist you with your next visit. Thank you for your comments and hopefully we hear from you soon.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
Good food. Even better service!

Came on a sunday afternoon for brunch. Brought the kids and the kids absolutely loved it. 
We started off with the Pickled Deviled Eggs and  short rib poutine! 
Then for entrees we got the 2 Braised Short Rib Benedict, chicken sandwich with a caesar salad, and also the craft platter. 

Our server (tall slim Asian) was very intentive and polite. He had us laughing and smiling even tho thru these hard times. 

We will be back again

owner_replies.comment:
Great photos and terrific review. We appreciate it. We are delighted that you stopped by and brought your kids.
Nothing more important than that the entire family enjoyed the experience and it sounds like you did.
We look forward seeing you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: This review is long over due. This was the best restaurant experience I've had in Atlanta. Everything was perfect from the moment we walked in until the moment we left. The food was amazing. The offer combinations of flavors I never would have thought to try. My husband and I went on our first day in 5 years since having kids/COVID. Our waitress, Sylvia, was so nice and helpful. She had amazing recommendations from appetizers to  desserts. The owner, I can't remember his name but he was amazing, came out and told us about the different bourbons we ordered. I recommend this place to everyone looking for a great night out. gorgeous  decor, amazing ambiance, superb food, and spectacular service. As soon as I get another free night we will  back!

Cons:Our server made 3/4 of our drinks and left without telling us, and then I had to find the "bartender" to ask who we should pay. 

I'd suggest hiring a real bartender and CARRYING Knob Creek if it's one of your 9 cocktails. My chicken and waffles ($23) were sent back bc they didn't season the chicken and the waffles were cold. This was after they brought everyone's food but mine, it wasn't worth waiting 13 minutes - 5 patrons in the restaurant 

Website doesn't have the same menu as the restaurant 

If this is going to be labeled a "hotel restaurant" the prices are appropriate, but if they're trying to make a name for themselves it's only a matter of time before it's closed 

Good things: the poutine  interior

owner_replies.comment:
Thanks for your feedback. The poutine is indeed my personal favorite as well.
I am sorry that the overall experience was not the same.
We appreciate that you stopped by and we would love to get some additional feedback.
If time allows, please contact our Food & Beverage Director Okan or myself at 678-412-2400
Much appreciated.
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: I took my Husband and father in law here for Father's Day. We had a 10:30 reservation. We were the first people to come into the restaurant at that time and soon after about 10 more parties showed up. Some had reservations some did not. We were all told that it would be about a 15 minute wait to sit at a table. Well come to find out they only had 3 servers working. I can honestly say that they did their best with only 3 servers and the food was ok, they didn't have a full menu but overall the choices were decent.

owner_replies.comment: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review. I will pass along your positive remarks to our staff as well as work with them on the issues you raised to ensure a better visit next time. Thank you for choosing Rowdy Tiger Whiskey Bar & Kitchen for your celebratory brunch.

comment.text: The food was ok. It was about 11am when we arrived and breakfast was over. The waitress was ok but not very attentive. The food arrived fast but again it was just ok.

owner_replies.comment:
Hello Lashanda, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback of your recent experience at Rowdy Tiger.  We truly appreciate hearing from our guest about all aspects of their experience. From your feedback it seems like we provided just ok service, and food. Our goal is to provide the best food and service we can, and just ok is not who we strive to be.  I would love to invite you and a guest back for dinner on us, and have you experience at Rowdy Tiger that is great.  If you would like to take us up on this please reach out to me at info@rowdytigeratl.com to set this up.  I hope to hear back from you.

comment.text:
I have not logged into Yelp in years, but I had to sign in to write about how great this place is. 

We came to the Rowdy Tiger on a lark on one of the worst weather nights I've ever had in Atlanta, but they took care of us. I cannot say enough about the exemplary service, truly special stuff here (extra special shout out to our server, Tony!). The cocktails were phenomenal, and the food was spot-on. I split the salmon salad thing with my mother-in-law, and I've never had salmon seasoned so well. My favorite dessert in the world is bread pudding, and Rowdy Tiger's bread pudding is up there with the best - baked and served in its own small cast iron skillet (!!). The ambiance is great - the space is broken up by big dividers, so the sound never gets too loud. The decor is modern without being annoyingly trendy. STRONG recommend

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your visit and strong recommendation. We appreciate the detailed positive feedback, which has been shared with our team. The team is delighted that you enjoyed the experience and look forward to your next visit. 
Stay well, 
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Food was very good and the service was impeccable!  Highly recommended.  I got the avocado toast and fried green tomatoes.

owner_replies.comment:
We are glad you enjoyed the avocado toast and friend green tomatoes, two local favorites.
Thank you for your commentary and stopping by.
See you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: Worst service I've ever seen at a Marriott property! Lazy bartender with an attitude. 5 people outside and no service after 15 minutes. Hello
One of the best outdoor spots in Atlanta. Good food, friendly service. I highly recommend the Rowdy Tiger

owner_replies.comment: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

comment.text:
Just dined with a group of friends. We had the pleasure of having Neicy as our server.    I started with a deliciously smooth whiskey cocktail- vieux something. The pork belly Mac and cheese was yummy as were the fried green tomatoes. A few of us ordered salads. The greens were super fresh and crisp. 

Throughout the service, Neicy was very attentive but not in an obtrusive way. I'd recommend this place to friends. Go try it!

owner_replies.comment:
We appreciate you and your friends. Thank you for your feedback and recognition. 
Recommendations like yours mean truly a lot to our team.
We look forward seeing you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text: In one word...AMAZING. From the the service...thanks Tony,  to the Peach Bourbon Smash to the Croissant Bread Pudding. AMAZING!

photos.caption: Mac n cheese with bourbon chicken

owner_replies.comment:
The Low Country Cioppino is one of my personal favorites as well. Thank you for the recognition and the visit.
We hope to see you soon again.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager

comment.text:
I guess I have always expected a lot better from this location but again disappointed. For the price the beef short ribs were not worth it. They were tender but I guess the server too a while as they were cool by the time I ate them. There was not enough sauce for the mashed potato and it had no flavor.

Disappointed...

owner_replies.comment:
Thank you for your comments and your visit. We consistently have received great comments about our amazing short ribs, so we are extremely sorry that yours were under expectation. If time allows, please give us call, as we want to inquiry about some additional details and provide corrective action as necessary.
We would sincerely appreciate it.
Stay well and continue to "Catch Prohibition by the Tail".
Martin van der Laan I General Manager
.

comment.text:
My friend and I came for a last minute birthday celebration for her this past Sunday, with about an hour and a half before closing time. We sat at the bar and was immediately greeted by Raymond. He was super kind and made us a "special drink" which was delicious. Even though we were told that the kitchen was closed, he/they still managed to snag us some fries so we didn't have to drink on an empty stomach. I am most definitely looking forward to coming back.
I don't usually leave five star reviews, or reviews for any reason, but the customer service was outstanding. Raymond even gave us a hug before we left! Such a sweetheart. 
The overall aesthetic of the restaurant was attractive and gave me upscale vibes but not too snooty.
10/10 recommend

owner_replies.comment:
We are thrilled that you stopped by and enjoyed the experience. Thank you for recognizing Raymond.
We truly look forward to your next visit.
Stay well,
Martin van der Laan I General Manager
